message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.MA, cs.SY, cs.MM 

This paper deals with the connectivity of ad hoc networks, which is a topic related to networked systems and communication. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The paper also involves the analysis of antenna patterns, which falls under the category of information theory (cs.IT). The use of mathematical models and analytic expressions suggests that the paper could also be classified under the category of mathematical analysis (cs.MA). The study of boundary effects and geometrical reasons for directional nodes being at a disadvantage suggests that the paper could also be classified under the category of systems and control (cs.SY). Finally, the discussion of multi-directional gain patterns suggests that the paper could also be classified under the category of multimedia (cs.MM).
